column10: 暴 力 犯 罪

column1: 資料來源： 內政部警政署。
column10: Source： National Police Agency, Ministry of the Interior.

column1: 說　　明： 1.暴力犯罪係指包括重傷害、故意殺人、強制性交、擄人勒贖、重大恐嚇取財、強盜、搶奪等。
column10: Note： 1.Violent crimes include serious injury, murder and nonnegligent manslaughter, forcible rape, kidnapping, Serious intimidation

column1: 2.「其他」包含馬來西亞、蒙古等其他國籍。

column10: 2.”Others” includes Malaysia, Mongolia, and other countries.
